Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory614.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab', 2: '2'}

{3: 'Lee continues to shoot with one hand, while loading a high-explosive magazine with the other. He fires high-temperature flames that can evaporate the seawater toward the area with dense Hetero-Creatures.'}

{1: '1', 3: "Through the breach Lee created, Lucia launches at one of the Omega Weapon deployment points. The Hetero-Creatures that were burned by Lee's flames are instantly frozen by her chilling cold."}
{2: 'Set up the Omega Weapon now, Liv!', 3: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I got this. The coordinates are already recorded.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Holding an Omega Weapon, Liv runs toward the defense position and swiftly installs it to the encirclement that was damaged by Hetero-Creatures, restoring the coastline defense.'}
{2: 'But how long can the Omega Weapons last...?', 3: '21'}
{3: 'After the battle, the Omega Weapons are almost used up. The defense will not last long if the weapons are not replenished...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You don't need to worry anymore, Commandant. Because...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You see an Engineering Force transport truck rapidly approaching. A girl is driving it.'}
{2: 'Karenina from the Engineering Force?', 3: '27'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Yo, Gray Raven Commandant! The backup Omega Weapons are here!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The truck comes to an abrupt stop. Karenina impatiently jumps off it, along with another girl you have never met before coming down the rear seat.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Nice to meet you, Gray Raven Commandant...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'This is Teddy. She can handle all system-related problems of Omega Weapon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'While Karenina will take over whenever you need violence...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'That sounds... very reliable.', 3: '36'}
{3: 'Teddy gazes around with an evil grin.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I heard you were speaking for Karenina in the Parliament... She was quite thankful for that and kept talking about how to repay that favor.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What?! I never said that... But I don't like owing someone a favor indeed. At least I can repay it this time. Just let us know if you need anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Don't just count me in...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alright, can you fix these damaged Omega Weapons first?', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "That's a lot... You're definitely not holding back.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Just then, Camu sends a comms request. He has been watching the outer area.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory616.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Hey... The Omega Weapons you deployed on the sea are being attacked by Hetero-Creatures. A lot of them already seem damaged. Do you want to do something about it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu points the camera of his terminal to the sea. A lot of Hetero-Creatures are already recklessly charging toward the encirclement of Omega Weapons. They will not last long.'}
{2: "Where's your light boat, Vera?", 3: '54'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Hey, No. 21! Where's our boat?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "Hey, Noctis! Where's our boat?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's all rocks here! The boat's stranded at the shore! ", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I could just crush all these rocks.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "You hear that, Gray Raven Commandant? We hardly made it here, and the boat's already scrapped after that tough voyage.", 4: '2'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory616.jpg'}
{3: 'Hearing your conversation, Karenina suddenly remembers something and smiles.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Worry not. After splitting with us, Rosetta went to the Arctic Route Union seeking help. She should have arrived now.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory612.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Thank you... I actually thought that, as a Forest Guard... Given all those barriers in the past, I would be rejected.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Captain', 3: 'Hah, did you learn this politeness from the guys in Babylonia?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "Right... Rosetta, you don't need to be so polite. If this ocean is contaminated by the Red Tide from now on, the Arctic Route Union would probably be devastated, given that it almost completely relies on the ocean to survive.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Captain', 3: "We're just helping ourselves after all. You don't need to hold back. Just use us as much as you need to.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sailor', 3: "Exactly. There're no more barriers now... We are all on the same ship, hunting the same big fish!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The captain gazes into the distance. Not far away, the giant humanoid is still relentlessly heading toward the land.'}
{2: 'Captain', 3: 'Hmph... I guess this fish is too big for us. However...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The captain swings his hand forward. A large harpoon quickly fires out, piercing a wandering Hetero-Creature.'}
{2: 'Captain', 3: 'We can still tackle some little ones!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Rosetta smiles. She lands on the ship's bow, pointing her spear at the enemies that she is about to confront while whispering to herself."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Commandant... This time, I will fight for myself, and I'm not alone... Everybody in the ARU will fight for themselves, for the future!", 4: '1'}
